name: Shuttle Invader
overview:
Shuttle Invader was produced by Omori Electronics Corporation in 1979.

Shuttle Invader is a Space Invaders clone that was released only in Japan by Omori Electronics Corp. It features a tank rolling back and forth between bunkers while shooting shuttle invaders. The game has a black and white monitor but the screen is painted with multicolored lines to simulate color play. Very little information is available on the game as the Omori company now makes automobile gauges and other auto electronics.
